TopicTitle: New to Ksp Forums. Pro at crashing. :)

Articles.Content:
How is it going ?

The name is RustyNail. been playing KSP since .22 first came out.

and just thought I would say hello to everyone
Welcome to the forums! Feel free to ask questions, share your triumphs and tragedies, or just jump into a discussion that catches your interest.
Crashes are the most fun. Especially when you try to figure out how that one landing leg, two struts, and one Kerbal made it through the disaster aka "learning opportunity".
